medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Decreased appetite for 3 days; recurrent diarrhea 1.5 weeks ago for 3 days prior to admission, treated with immodium, followed by sensation of fullness and inability to have bowel movements since then. No vomiting, nausea, or abdominal pain was reported. Patient felt generally unwell.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, hypertension, exploratory laparotomy with reportedly nothing found, possible pancreatic abscess, decreased hearing.
